name: The Kids Are Out of Control
name_original: The Kids Are Out of Control
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Play as a chunky puppy doing their very best to bring some kids home-- of course these kids would rather play, and get themselves hurt. Guide kids with different personalities and behaviors back home with the power of your trusty bark.

Programming and Implementation by Lupoglaz
Music and Sound by NeonAfroSloth
Design and Animations by Johanna Bosley
Art and Animation by The Wandering Shadow

Control:
wasd - movement
space - bark

Goal:
Bring children inside the fence.
